name: A light burnished brigandine
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom magnificently.
It increases the users intelligence divinely.
It has great armour class for its type (superb in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration ILLEGALLY.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users physical resistance superbly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
